text: Cun ʙaroi giriftani ƣanimatho ʙa roh ʙijafted, onon, ki az çang taxalluf (qafokaşī) namudaand, xohand guft: «Bigzored, to mo ham az pai şumo ʙijoem! Mexohand suxani Xudoro digargun kunand. Bigū: '«Şumo hargiz az pai mo naxohed omad. Xudo az peş cunin guftaast». Sipas xohand guft: «Balki ʙar mo hasad meʙared?» Na, inho çuz andake namefahmand
